div.p: The XREF element, available everywhere in the textbase and its documentation in which prose is permitted, surrounds a URL which you wish to make into a hyperlink. It has two required attributes, RESP, and URL. The URL attribute must be filled in full, including the http and www portions.

Some long URLs contain strings of characters which your XML editing tool might confuse with entity references. If this happens, you will get a validation error. Contact the textbase coordinator for the best means of revising the URL without losing the necessary information.
